title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation starter using Ollama + Chroma; ingest PDFs then chat.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that adds a private GitHub-Copilot-like sidebar powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI for interactive chatting, model management and REPL with syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & auto-scaling support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) plus compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; sync/async, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with .NET 6+ support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI (Tauri + React) for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes OpenAI-compatible endpoints backed by Ollama for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Python integration with Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot server (Bolt.js) that brings Ollama models into enterprise Slack workspaces privately.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Utility to convert & quantize Hugging Face models into Ollama Modelfile format with one command.
